Title: Extended MessageBox
Description: ExtendedMessageBox makes it easier to display messages from your Windows applications. Based on the built-in .NET MessageBox class functionality, it enables you display your messages with style and enable users to save or copy errors into files or the clipboard.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
  • ExtendedMessageBox makes it easier to display messages from your Windows applications. Based on the built-in .NET MessageBox class functionality, it enables you display your messages with style and enable users to save or copy errors into files or the clipboard.

Prerequisites
  • Visual Studio 2008
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1

Details
  • Written in C#
